name: saladvn
description:
"It's a little awkward talking about all these girls like this, but I guess I have to..."

"Hanaoka Suzune. Top of the class, and an elegant beauty for sure, she's got this refined air around her... Almost ethereal."

"My little sister Minami... She's one year younger than me, and  a supreme pain in the ass."

"Delinquent. Troublemaker. Really cute... That's Sana."

"Almost floating around the stage, dressed in all white as if she were a ghost, Rei commands my attention."

"Growing up, there was this older girl named Aoi who lived in our neighbourhood. This young woman standing in front of the class, however..."

__________________________________________________________________________________

What started out as an inside joke finally exists now and you can read it.

Is it good? I dunno.

Made using as many free-to-use assets as possible.

(the password is password)
